   Featured on Android Central's Apps of the Week - "Beyond
   just the gameplay, this developer is doing all of the
   right things." 148Apps calls TowerMadness 2 "a solidly
   dependable Tower Defense game, much like its
   predecessor." ????? by David E. - "An amazing update to
   an amazing game!" The aliens are back, and this time
   theyÃ‚â€™re on a mission to turn your beloved sheep into
   sweaters for their emperor! The sequel to the hit tower
   defense strategy adventure TowerMadness is finally here.
   Protect your flock using quick thinking and an arsenal
   of awesome weapons. OPTIMIZED FOR A WIDE RANGE OF
   TABLETS AND PHONES ALL NEW LEVELS 40 exciting maps to
   master over 4 campaigns on varying environments, each
   with unique gameplay challenges. NEW AND IMPROVED
   WEAPONS Send the aliens scrambling back home with
   updated versions of your favorite original TowerMadness
   weapons, plus all new towers including the Stun Gun,
   Shrink Tower, and more! NEW ENEMIES 16 different alien
   enemies with unique abilities and weaknesses. NEW
   CHARACTERS Introducing Bo the ram, a powerful new
   defender against the alien menace. Xen the shopkeeper
   offers you special deals on the latest alien weapon
   technology so you can give the invaders a taste of their
   own medicine! CLOUD SAVING WITH GOOGLE DRIVE Save your
   game progress and restore it to your other Android
   devices. GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES SUPPORT Compete with
   your friends to see who has the fastest time on the
   leaderboards! GAME CONTROLLER SUPPORT Play TowerMadness
   2 with a gamepad for a console like gaming experience.
